cqtx-hsmacros-0.1: Haskell preprocessing / code generation for the cqtx C++ library

Portabilityportable
Stabilityexperimental
Maintainer(@) sagemuej $ smail.uni-koeln.de
Safe HaskellSafe-Inferred

CodeGen.CXX.Code

Description

A writer monad for building up C++ code, to use Haskell as a (way more powerful) replacement for the C preprocessor. Unlike that, it is designed to produce reasonably human-readable code, so the resulting files can also be used as "proper" code files, without Haskell available.

Synopsis

  • type CXXExpression = String
  • type CXXCode = Writer LinesBuildup
  • cxxLine :: String -> CXXCode ()
  • cxxIndent :: Int -> CXXCode a -> CXXCode a

  • cxxSurround :: CXXExpression -> CXXCode a -> CXXExpression -> CXXCode a
  • procCXXCode :: (CXXExpression -> CXXExpression) -> CXXCode a -> CXXCode a
  • cxxConcatBlockIndented :: CXXCode a -> CXXCode b -> CXXCode b
  • cxxCombineBlockIndented :: (CXXExpression -> CXXExpression -> CXXExpression) -> CXXCode a -> CXXCode b -> CXXCode b
  • noCXXCode :: CXXCode ()
  • cxxCodeString :: CXXCode () -> String
  • makeSafeCXXIdentifier :: CXXExpression -> CXXExpression

type CXXCode = Writer LinesBuildupSource

cxxIndent :: Int -> CXXCode a -> CXXCode aSource

cxxPreFirstLine :: CXXExpression -> CXXCode a -> CXXCode aSource

Add something in front of the first line, and indent the remaining ones accordingly so the relative alignment is preserved.
